item.description:
Get ready to load up your iPhone with new contacts and friends!

Join other Boston young professionals and business owners for a relaxed afterwork networking social. You should attend if you're looking to meet new people, promote your business or just kick back after a hard day of work and socialize. We'll have name tags available for our members so you'll be able to find our group. In order to help you network more effectively, each name tag will be affixed with colored dots that correspond to your particular career field.


ADMISSION:
$5 in advance
$10 at the door
*Covers supplies like nametags, etc, plus a gratuity for the bar plus the event host's time/travel expenses

PRE-PAY HERE - http://bostonmoxieint...


Sync up with business professionals to promote yourself and your business. Explore new business opportunities, make business contacts and form strategic partnerships with other successful professionals, entrepreneurs and business owners. You`ll be able to mix and mingle freely with other attendees so you can meet as many other networkers as possible.

There will be a mingle portion early in the evening. Once everyone has arrived, we can each deliver a 30 second pitch of our professional skills/service.

Bring promotional items, postcards, business cards if you have them!

Cash bar will also be available.

INCLUDES:
Event Host (want to be a Host or a Greeter? Email me!)
Nametags
Semi-Private Space to Facilitate Pitch Portion
Dedicated waitperson for our group



HOW IT WILL WORK:
7:00PM: Check in & Informal Networking

7:30 - 8:00 - Each attendee gives a 30 second pitch of their business, service or skills

8:00-9:30 PM: Targeted networking & socializing
item.how_to_find_us: We have rented the 3rd floor private for our members from 7-9pm

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Young Professionals Networking Reception
